title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 5301 - GAMING FACILITY LICENSING
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 5301

Adopted

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, § 104[19]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
